networkplugin.name: BuzzCity
networkplugin.info_content:
Network Info

Focused mostly on Mobile Web Traffic, BuzzCity has grown to be a significant player in the mobile advertising industry.

Ad Formats

BuzzCity supports standard Banners as well as Text and Tablet Ads. All of ButtCity's ad units are supported through mAdserve.

Best Countries

India, Indonesia, Thailand, Malaysia
